titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-620, by Mr. Goss.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 207.

bill.summary: 7/26/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Makes it in order at any time on September 4, 2002, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
